experience.name: JAMF
experience.title: Cross Platform Engineer
experience.description: I worked on JAMF Software's Objective-C OS X products which included Casper Recon, the JAMF Binary, and Composer. I also worked in C#, .Net-2.0 framework, where I rewrote the JAMF.exe command line utility, implemented certificate based communication and added unit testing on the project, allowing the Windows customers to have a secure environment. I worked in python (v2.7) on the JAMF Distribution Server (JDS), adding the Unit Testing Framework (pytest) and implementing with Jenkins CI. I was also a part of the sustaining engineering team, where I worked on defects in all platforms, including Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bash, Ruby, Python and RealBasic.

experience.name: JAMF
experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Migrated internal OS X frameworks to a stable in house CocoaPod infrastructure. Created bug fixes for JAMF Binary and JAMF Admin OS X applications as part of the Casper Suite 9.0 release. Assisted in developing and furthering JAMF client side automated testing.
